item.name: newsletter_already_subscribed
item.value: You are already subscribed to our newsletter

item.name: newsletter_in_order_to_sign_up
item.value: In order to sign up to our newsletter you have to

item.name: no_longer_available
item.value: 해당 상품의 구매가 더이상 불가능합니다. 장바구니에서 지울까요?
Product is no longer available. Delete it from cart?

item.name: you_can_review_order
item.value: (주문을 확정하기 전에 다시 한번 확인하실 수 있습니다.)
(You can review this order before it's final)

item.name: login_to_view
item.value: 이 페이지를 보기 위해서는 로그인하셔야 합니다.
Please log in to view this page

item.name: order_successfully_created
item.value: You order has been successfully created with id %s.

item.name: please_check_order
item.value: 주문이 성공적으로 되었는지 계정을 확인해 보십시오. 1시간 이내로 아무런 정보도 받지 못하신다면 기술 담당자에게 연락하십시오.
Please check your account to see if your order was successfully created. If you do not receive any information in 1 hour, please contact tech support.

item.name: please_review_order
item.value: 주문을 다시 한 번 확인해 주십시오. 확인을 누르면 결제가 될 것입니다.
Please review your order. Payment will be made when you click Submit.

item.name: page_not_found_details
item.value: Ooops! Can't find the page you're looking for.

item.name: about_shop
item.value: Shop is a e-shop module running on XpressEngine.

item.name: msg_requried_version
item.value: 상점 모듈은 %s. 버전 이상의 XE Core에서만 작동합니다.
Shop requires XE core version equal to or greater than %s.

item.name: no_product
item.value: 추가 된 상품이 없습니다. simple product를 추가하거나 configurable product를 추가하십시오.
There is no product added, Add simple product or Add configurable product.

item.value: Are you sure you want to delete this product?

item.name: about_category_scope
item.value: By not selecting any category the scope of the attribute will be global
By not selecting any category the scope of the attribute will be global

item.name: about_category
item.value: Select the categories of the product

item.name: about_select_attributes
item.value: Only select type attributes are able to determine configurable products
Only select type attributes are able to determine configurable products

item.name: no_config_attributes
item.value: There are no dropdown (seclect) attributes. Add attribute
There are no dropdown (seclect) attributes. Add attribute

item.name: about_select_associated_products
item.value: This combinations will be generated into simple products and will be associated with this parent product
This combinations will be generated into simple products and will be associated with this parent product

item.name: notice_update_configurable
item.value: When updating a configurable product the values of associated products will not be affected. You will have to edit them sepparatly.
When updating a configurable product the values of associated products will not be affected. You will have to edit them sepparatly.

item.name: about_select_import_file
item.value: The file must be a zip file

item.name: no_subscribers
item.value: No one is subscribed to your newsletter

item.name: unsubscribe_message
item.value: To unsubscribe from this newsletter click here

item.name: about_unit_of_measure
item.value: 상품 무게 측정과 배송을 위한 측정 단위 입력
Choose the unit of measure you will use for product weight and shipping

item.name: show_VAT
item.value: Show VAT on prices on frontend

item.name: about_price_VAT
item.value: 이 가격이 제품 전체의 가격입니다. (부가세 포함)
This price will be the total product price (including VAT)

item.name: allow_profile_image_size
item.value: 이미지 사이즈가 자동으로 %dx%dpx 로 조정 될 것입니다.
Image size will be adjusted into %dx%dpx automatically.

item.name: about_shop_description
item.value: Whether to be displayed depends on skins, or you can show it by HTML·CSS editor.
Whether to be displayed depends on skins, or you can show it by HTML·CSS editor.

item.name: about_addon
item.value: Addons are to control Shop's actions. Turning on/off addons would add useful features to your sites.
Addons are to control Shop's actions. Turning on/off addons would add useful features to your sites.

item.name: about_font_family
item.value: 컨텐츠 기본 글꼴을 설정할 수 있습니다 (ex:%s)
You can choose default fonts for contents (ex:%s)

item.name: about_font_size
item.value: 기본 폰트 크기 설정 가능 (예시: 12px 또는 1em - 단위가 반드시 포함되어야 함)
You can choose default font size (ex: 12px or 1em - unit should be included)

item.name: about_shop_editor
item.value: 기본 편집기: 게시글 내에서 문단 별로 편집 가능
Shop's default editor: You can edit each paragraph separately in your posts

item.name: about_referer
item.value: 방문자의 레퍼러를 볼 수 있음 (방문 경로).
You can see visitors' referer (the route they come through).

item.name: about_change_password
item.value: 비밀번호 확인을 위해 새 비밀번호를 다시 입력해주세요.
Input new password again to check correctness.

item.name: about_attribute_values
item.value: Possible values, separated by the | character. I.e. one|two|three
Possible values, separated by the | character. I.e. one|two|three

item.name: about_shop_admin
item.value: 콤마 (,)를 입력하여 다수의 관리자 이메일을 입력할 수 있습니다.
You can enter more admins by just sepparating them with a comma (,).

item.name: my_account_info_text
item.value: Here you can see your recent activity and edit your account information
Here you can see your recent activity and edit your account information

item.name: none_visitor
item.value: There is no visitor for the duration.

item.name: day
item.value: 시간대별 방문자 수를 보실 수 있습니다.
You can see the number of visitors by hours.

item.name: week
item.value: You can see the number of visitors by day over a week.
You can see the number of visitors by day over a week.

item.name: month
item.value: You can see the number of visitors by month over a year.
You can see the number of visitors by month over a year.

item.name: trackback_division
item.value: Multiple trackback urls are separated by newline(Enter)
Multiple trackback urls are separated by newline(Enter)

item.name: discount_min_amount
item.value: Minimum order amount to apply discount
Minimum order amount to apply discount

item.name: about_discount_type
item.value: Fixed amount or percentage from order total
Fixed amount or percentage from order total

item.name: about_discount_amount
item.value: Enter discount amount or set it to 0 to disable the whole discount.
Enter discount amount or set it to 0 to disable the whole discount.

item.name: discount_tax_phase
item.value: When to apply the discount by tax
When to apply the discount by tax

item.name: out_of_stock_products
item.value: Display out of stock products on frontend
Display out of stock products on frontend

item.name: about_minimum_order
item.value: 이 수량 이상 만큼만 주만할 수 있습니다
Only orders bigger than this amount can be sent

item.name: msg_select_skin
item.value:
선택하신 상점 스킨으로 변경합니다.

현재의 스킨 설정은 삭제 됩니다.

정말로 바꾸시겠습니까?

Change Shop skin into what you choose.

Current configuration of skin will be removed.

Are you sure to change it?

item.name: msg_already_used_url
item.value: The URL is already being used.

item.name: alert_reset_skin
item.value: 스킨을 초기화하시면, 입력하신 모든 HTML·CSS가 지워질 것입니다.\n\n정말로 초기화하시겠습니까?
If you reset skin, all the HTML·CSS you inputted will be removed.\n\nAre you sure to reset it?

item.name: msg_shop_init_about
item.value: 정보를 모두 초기화합니다. 상점을 초기화 한 후 데이터를 복구하는 것이 불가능합니다.
Reset all information .It is impossible to recover the data after resetting your Shop.

item.name: msg_check_userimage
item.value: gif, png, jpg, swf 파일을 업로드 하실 수 있습니다.
You may upload gif, png, jpg, swf file.

item.name: about_shop_skin_import
item.value: It uploads customized skin from local folder, and current skin will be removed.
It uploads customized skin from local folder, and current skin will be removed.

item.name: msg_module_count_exceed
item.value: You cannot add this type of module anymore.
You cannot add this type of module anymore.

item.name: msg_limit_shop_extra_mid
item.value: Only format of alphabets + [alphabets, numbers, and underscore(_)] is allowed.
Only format of alphabets + [alphabets, numbers, and underscore(_)] is allowed.

item.name: about_shop_pages
item.value: 상점에 페이지를 추가할 수 있으며 추후에 메뉴에 페이지를 연결시킬 수 있습니다.
You may add pages to your shop and later include them in one of your menus

item.name: msg_mobile_skin_use_not
item.value: 모바일 스킨을 사용하고 있지 않습니다. 사용하시려면 적용하기를 눌러주세요.
You are not using any mobile skins. Please click on Apply This to use one.

item.name: notify_for_replies
item.value: Notify by email if someone replies to my comment

item.name: confirm_cancel_comment
item.value: Would you like to cancel editing your comment?

item.name: no_gateways
item.value: 결제 플러그인이 설치되어 있지 않습니다. "./modules/shop/plugins_payment/" 폴더를 확인해 보시기 바랍니다.
No payment plugins seem to be installed. Please check that your "./modules/shop/plugins_payment/" folder actually contains some payment plugins.

item.name: unable_to_delete
item.value: Unable to delete payment plugins folder

item.name: no_products_categ
item.value: There are no products in this category

item.name: about_adding_associated_products
item.value: You are adding associated products to the configurable product that has the title %s and sku: %s
You are adding associated products to the configurable product that has the title %s and sku: %s

item.name: about_editing_associated_products
item.value: This is an associated simple product for the configurable product with the title: %s and sku:%s
This is an associated simple product for the configurable product with the title: %s and sku:%s

item.name: no_more_variants
item.value: There are no more product variants
There are no more product variants

item.name: about_not_logged
item.value: 이 페이지에 접근하기 위해서 로그인을 하셔야 합니다.
To access this part of the site you have to be logged in.

item.name: db_query_failed
item.value: 데이터베이스 요청에 실패했습니다. - 가장 최근에 모듈을 변경하셨다면, 변경사항을 확인해주십시오.
The database query failed - please check if you have updated you module with the latest changes.

item.name: msg_select_product_variant
item.value: 원하시는 상품 종류를 선택해주세요. 추가할 수 있는 상품 종류에는 몇가지 선택지가 있습니다.
Please select type of product that you want - the one you tried to add has a few options for you too choose.

item.name: about_shop_email
item.value: 모든 이메일 알림이 이 주소를 발송자로 발송됩니다.
All email notifications will be sent from this address

item.name: order_email_content
item.value:
%s님 안녕하세요,

구매해주셔서 감사합니다. 주문에 대한 영수증입니다.

이 주문에 대해 확인하고 싶으신가요?

주문번호 #%s에 대한 실시간 정보를 여기서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

%s

Hello %s,

Thank you for your purchase! Here is your order receipt.

How do I check on this order?

Get up to date information about order #%s

%s

item.name: admin_order_email_subject
item.value: A new order was made by %s (%s)

item.name: new_member_email_content
item.value:
%s에 오신 것을 환영합니다!

계정 설정이 성공적으로 완료되었습니다.

계정으로 로그인해서 이 주소의 과거 주문을 확인할 수 있습니다.:

회원정보

선택해주셔서 감사합니다! %s

Welcome to %s!

You have successfully set up your account.

You can login to your account and see your past orders at this address:

My account

Thank your for choosing %s!

item.name: not_allowed_to_add_more_than_2_configurable_attributes
item.value: 당신이 설정 가능한 상품에 대해 최대 두가지 속성까지 선택할 수 있습니다.
You can only select maximun 2 attributes for your configurable product.

item.name: co_review_order
item.value: 주문을 제출하기 전에 이 주문을 검토해주십시오.
You can later review your order before submitting it

item.name: msg_invalid_shipping_price
item.value: The value you entered for price is invalid.

item.name: msg_invalid_shipping_type
item.value: The value you entered for shipping type is invalid.

item.name: msg_authorize_missing_fields
item.value: API 로그인 아이디, 처리 키(Transaction key), 게이트웨이 API 주소(URL)을 입격해주셔야 합니다. 위 모든 항목은 필수 항목입니다.
You must enter your API Login ID, Transaction key and Gateway API URL - all fields are mandatory.

item.name: msg_paypal_express_missing_fields
item.value: API 사용자 이름(Username), API 암호(Password), 서명(Signature), 그리고 게이트웨이 API 주소(URL)을 입력해주셔야 합니다. 위 모든 항목은 필수 항목입니다.
You must enter your API Username, API Password, Signature and Gateway API URL - all fields are mandatory.

item.name: msg_paypal_standard_missing_fields
item.value: 사업용 이메일 주소, PDT 토큰, 게이트웨이 API 주소(URL)을 입력해주셔야 합니다. 위 모든 항목은 필수 항목입니다.
You must enter your Business Email, PDT Token and Gateway API URL - all fields are mandatory.

item.name: order_failed
item.value: 지불 과정에 문제가 발생했습니다. 주문이 저장되지 않았습니다.
There was a problem processing your payment. Your order has not been created.
